# Roadmap

Proton UI is in active development and has not reached a stable release just yet. Below you will find the planned components to be covered by the initial v1.0 release.

# Completed

  • Button
  • Card
  • Charts
    • Frappe Charts
  • Input
  • Toggle

# In Progress

  • DataTable
  • Dropdown
  • Modal
  • Select

# To-Do

  • Alert
  • Checkbox
  • Chip
  • List
    • Draggable
  • Number
  • Radio
  • Tabs
  • Textarea
  • Tooltip
  • WYSIWYG
    • Ability to configure which WYSIWYG editor to use:
    • Redactor
    • Quill
Help us improve this page!
Last Updated: 10/17/2018, 4:38:47 PM
